options.notify_message_paused: {{ trigger_sensor_name }} has been detected as open for a significant period of time. Ecobee will shut down until all doors and windows have been closed.
options.notify_message_resumed: All doors and windows have been closed. Ecobee will resume normal operation.

attributes.description: When ON: Thermostat only activates for active (occupied) rooms. When OFF: Thermostat also activates for unoccupied rooms with critical temperatures. Use 'Eco Mode Critical Tracking' select to control critical-room behavior while eco is ON.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Eco Mode

attributes.description: Used when eco mode is active AND everyone is away AND 'Use Eco Away Targets' behavior is selected. Set conservative targets here for maximum energy savings while away.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Eco Away Virtual Thermostat

attributes.description: Configures how eco mode behaves when everyone is away. 'Disable Eco When Away' reverts to normal behavior with critical room protection. 'Use Eco Away Targets' uses the Eco Away thermostat targets. 'Keep Eco Active' will not heat/cool while away (energy savings, but no protection).
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Eco Behavior When Away

attributes.description: When ON: Only rooms with 'Track [Room]' enabled will be heated/cooled. When OFF: All rooms are considered for heating/cooling decisions.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Only Track Selected Rooms

attributes.description: When ON: Dining Room is included in heating/cooling decisions. This only takes effect when 'Only Track Selected Rooms' is enabled.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Track Dining Room

attributes.description: When ON: Guest Bathroom is included in heating/cooling decisions. This only takes effect when 'Only Track Selected Rooms' is enabled.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Track Guest Bathroom

attributes.description: When ON: Guest Room is included in heating/cooling decisions. This only takes effect when 'Only Track Selected Rooms' is enabled.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Track Guest Room

attributes.description: When ON: Music Room is included in heating/cooling decisions. This only takes effect when 'Only Track Selected Rooms' is enabled.

attributes.description: When ON: Theater Room is included in heating/cooling decisions. This only takes effect when 'Only Track Selected Rooms' is enabled.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Track Theater Room

attributes.description: Controls which critical temperature rooms are tracked when Eco Mode is active. 'Do Not Track Critical' ignores all inactive rooms. 'Track Select Critical' only tracks rooms with 'Force Track When Critical' enabled. 'Track All Critical' tracks all inactive critical rooms (eco savings only for non-critical).
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Eco Mode Critical Tracking

attributes.description: When ON: This room is always included for critical-temperature tracking when applicable. Used by 'Eco Mode Critical Tracking' = 'Track Select Critical'.
attributes.friendly_name: Thermostat Contact Sensors Dining Room Force Track When Critical

attributes.description: When ON: This room is always included for critical-temperature tracking when applicable. Used by 'Eco Mode Critical Tracking' = 'Track Select Critical'.
